BaseNodeÂ¶

struct asmjit::BaseNode
#include <compiler.h>

Base node.

Every node represents an abstract instruction, directive, label, or macro-instruction generated by compiler.

Public Functions

BaseNode(BaseCompiler * compiler, uint32_t type)

Create new BaseNode.

Note
Always use compiler to create nodes.

~BaseNode()

Destroy BaseNode.

BaseNode * getPrev()

Get previous node in the compiler stream.

BaseNode * getNext()

Get next node in the compiler stream.

const char * getComment()

Get comment string.

void setComment(const char * comment)

Set comment string to str.

uint32_t getType()

Get type of node, see kNodeType.

uint32_t getFlags()

Get node flags.

void setFlags(uint32_t flags)

Set node flags to flags.

bool hasFlag(uint32_t flag)

Get whether the instruction has flag flag.

void addFlags(uint32_t flags)

Add instruction flags.

void delFlags(uint32_t flags)

Clear instruction flags.

bool isFetched()

Get whether the node has beed fetched.

bool isTranslated()

Get whether the node has been translated.

bool isJmp()

Whether the instruction is an unconditional jump.

bool isJcc()

Whether the instruction is a conditional jump.

bool isJmpOrJcc()

Whether the instruction is an unconditional or conditional jump.

bool isRet()

Whether the instruction is a return.

bool isSpecial()

Get whether the instruction is special.

bool isFp()

Get whether the instruction accesses FPU.

uint32_t getFlowId()

Get flow index.

void setFlowId(uint32_t flowId)

Set flow index.

bool hasVarInst()

Get whether node contains variable allocation instructions.

BaseVarInst * getVarInst()

Get variable allocation instructions.

template < typename T >
T * getVarInst()

Get variable allocation instructions <T>.

void setVarInst(BaseVarInst * vi)

Set variable allocation instructions.

BaseVarState * getState()

Get node state.

template < typename T >
T * getState()

Get node state <T>.

void setState(BaseVarState * state)

Set node state.

bool hasLiveness()

Get whether the node has variable liveness bits.

VarBits * getLiveness()

Get variable liveness bits.

void setLiveness(VarBits * liveness)

Set variable liveness bits.

Public Members

BaseNode * _prev

Previous node.

BaseNode * _next

Next node.

uint8_t _type

Node type, see kNodeType.

uint8_t _opCount

Operands count (if the node has operands, otherwise zero).

uint16_t _flags

Node flags, different meaning for every node type.

uint32_t _flowId

Flow index.

const char * _comment

Inline comment string, initially set to NULL.

BaseVarInst * _varInst

Variable allocation instructions (initially NULL, filled by prepare phase).

VarBits * _liveness

Variable liveness bits (initially NULL, filled by analysis phase).

BaseVarState * _state

Saved state.

Initially NULL, not all nodes have saved state, only branch/flow control nodes.

Private Functions

BaseNode(const BaseNode & other)

BaseNode & operator=(const BaseNode & other)
